merge_note: Single inventory_getInventory call. Pass itemUrl as the identifier. inventoryCount of -1 means unlimited.

mappings.notes: itemNumber is the seller SKU. itemUrl is the Rakuten-specific identifier. Both may need to be stored.
inventoryCount = -1 means unlimited stock. Post-process: if qty == -1: qty = 9999 (or your sentinel value for unlimited).
Rakuten does not return a lastUpdated timestamp on inventory. Use datetime.utcnow() at sync time.
